name: The Catalyst Group
overview:
The Catalyst Group, a global boutique consultancy with over 25 years experience, serves a diverse spectrum of process industries, including the following: refining, chemicals, natural gas, polymers, specialty chemicals, and related industries (such as catalyst Manufacturers, EPCs, material sciences, pharmaceuticals, and environmental services).

We serve our clients in two ways: via client directed projects (TCG Private Consulting) and via various programs and studies (TCGR).

The Catalyst Group, Private Consulting, brings our unique competency & talent base directly into your company. We work with clients on both a traditional project-specific business model, for one-time project work, as well as a key account model creating an internal resource extension to your business and allowing for an intimate relationship within our clientâ€™s team.

The Catalyst Group Resources, is dedicated to monitoring and analyzing technical and commercial developments in the process industries. Through multi-subscriber studies, annual subscription services, confidential membership programs and technical/commercial conferences and workshops TCGR delivers timely, insightful value added services that can be used to achieve a competitive advantage.
